summary: This mod contains a few spells which let you one ore transmute (any kind, no dwarven stuff) into one ingot.
descriptionHtml:
This simple, little mod does exactly what it says. If you use the right spell and you have one ore, the ore will change into a ingot. This works with all ores, but not with dwemer stuff. 

You can buy the spells in Riverwood, at the Riverwood trader. 
Transmute Corundum
Transmute Ebony
Transmute Orichalcum
Transmute Gold
Transmute Silver
Transmute Moonstone
Transmute Malachite
Transmute Quicksilver

I recommend one thing, if you use one of the transmute spells twice, and you have only one ore, something strange may happen, or nothing happens, i don't know wich one. 

If you want to say something about this mod, something for a future update maybe, or a bug, write it in the comments. 

I will add screenshots later
author: SlayerOfDragons
